Text: Excellent album indeed.  Unfortunately I couldn't convert 3 songs from flac but might be on my end.  Thanks for posting!  Cheers

BinkMastering:   I'll check what I can .......are you using a codec other than .flac for playback?.....just wondering....perhaps you could burn a CDR from the .flac files and then re- rip into whatever codec you want with EAC (if all else fails)
